snippet: Iran’s longtime ambassador to the International Atomic Energy Agency will become the third senior Iranian nuclear official to be replaced under President Hassan Rouhani.
abstract: Iran’s longtime ambassador to the International Atomic Energy Agency, Ali Asghar Soltanieh, will leave in September, becoming the third senior Iranian nuclear official to be replaced under Pres Hassan Rouhani.
lead_paragraph: Iran’s longtime ambassador to the International Atomic Energy Agency will become the third senior Iranian nuclear official to be replaced under President Hassan Rouhani.

headline.main: Iran: Another Nuclear Official to Be Replaced
headline.print_headline: Iran: Another Nuclear Official to Be Replaced
